Illwinter

Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Illwinter
The caster sacrifices the blood of innocent virgins in an attempt to revive the old Rimtursar, ancient giants of terrible might and the ancestors of the Jotun. The giants are slow to awaken but their presence will cause blizzards, wolf attacks and severe cold all over the world. The Illwinter is the most feared of all omens and unrest will increase worldwide.
Affects entire world. 50% chance of unrest +d4, Cold +1 for every 4 months, random attacks in cold provinces. Allows recruitment of one Niefel Giant in every fort for Jotun nations.
